```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read}
x <- read_csv("raw-data/AllPrintingsCSVFiles.tar.bz2")

glimpse(x)
```

```{r}
sample_card <- read_table("magic_world_championships/magic_worlds_2020/Andrea-Mengucci-Mono-Red-Aggro-Magic-World-Championship-XXVI.txt", col_names = FALSE)

sample_card$number <- str_extract(sample_card$X1, "\\d{0,3}")

sample_card$abbrev <- substr(str_extract(sample_card$X1, "\\(.*?\\)"),2,4)

sample_card$number_2 <- substr(str_extract(sample_card$X1, "\\) \\d{0,6}"), 3, nchar(sample_card$X1) + 1)

sample_card$name <- substr(sample_card$X1, nchar(sample_card$number)+1, nchar(sample_card$X1)- nchar(sample_card$abbrev) -nchar(sample_card$number_2)-3)

sample_card$X1 <- NULL
View(sample_card)
```
